name: ts-endpoint
description: Simple endpoint definition for fullstack safety.
author: Federico Sordillo <federicosordillo@gmail.com>

scripts.test-package-in-lib: test -f lib/package.json || echo "no need to publish"
scripts.npm-publish-beta: yarn test-package-in-lib && npm publish lib --tag beta
scripts.postversion: cp package.json lib && cp -r lib lib2 && mv lib2 lib/lib
